body: The program works on both RHEL 6 (2.6.32-504.23.4.el6.s390x) and 7 (3.10.0-327.4.5.el7.s390x). I assume this is therefore a RHEL 5 specific issue (I don't have a RHEL 5 machine on hand to try unfortunately). I'll investigate further tomorrow however RHEL 5 isn't supported by Go so I'm not sure we will be able to fix this (see https://golang.org/doc/install and http://dave.cheney.net/2013/06/18/how-to-install-go-1-1-on-centos-5).
